nodes.text: In case you missed it: Southern Made Saturday’s, featuring @DrinkFreshh mobile smoothie bar. Pull up on the block and catch some organic vibes. 🍊\nSocial Distancing enforced. https://t.co/K30wEcXHVa
1 more day till the SMC block party. Bring your crew & let’s have some fun (but social distance)
We’re hosting a pop up block party in Birmingham this Saturday. Sunshine, smoothies and black business. Details tonight.
